title: dhinamE sudhinamu
sahitya:
dinamE sudinamu rAmuni golcu dinamE sudinamu





caraNam 1



 ghanamaina bhakti cEkoni EvELa manamuna shrI rAmuni cintincina

   



caraNam 2



 rangagunaTTi mrdanga tALamu celanga tamburu shruti sangati pogaDu

   



caraNam 3



 bhaktulatO nanu raktini gUDuga bhakti mIraganu bhaktavatsalu pogaDu

   



caraNam 4



 rArA nannu gaikOrA neranamminArA ninnu viDalErAyani vEDu

   



caraNam 5



 dIna sharaNya mahAnubhAva O gAnalOla nanu karuNincumani golcu

   



caraNam 6



 vAsiga shrI haridAsula gUDuka vEsuka gantulu vAsudEvuni bADu

   



caraNam 7



 karamu velangu banga puSpamula cEta dhara bhadragiri rAmadAsuDu pUjincu
